attributes.action: Prioritise Cleaners for the covid vaccine
attributes.additional_details: Prioritise all cleaners for the covid vaccine, as front line workers we deserve to be safe
attributes.background: Prioritise all cleaners for the covid vaccine, as front line workers we deserve to be safe

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you'd like this to include domestic cleaners or those working in specific keyworker roles. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.  If you do, you'll need to include a full name.
